issue.title: [CF 1077] Name of the spell target of the unit
issue.body:
Hello,

Please i can't find how to announce the name of the spell target of the unit.
For example : I need to announce the resurrection of someone :

``` %u is casting %s on %? ```

The ? is the name of the target of the spell (could be the target, targetoftarget, focus, target of focus, mouseover or the target of the mouseover of the unit)

Thanks.


> Posted by CurseForge user akreem | Imported from CurseForge issue #1077 | Raw

comments.body:
This is not possible. The targets of spells are not available in the combat log to prevent abuse.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
